Title: The Origins of Monstrosity
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Ryan Murphy
Actors: Zachary Quinto, Joseph Fiennes, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters
Plot: A mysterious little girl is abandoned at Briarcliff. The Monsignor makes a Faustian pact with Dr. Arden. The origin of Bloody Face is revealed.
